rules.natural: If the Scientific Review Board approves the conservation project proposal, then should the Conservation Consortium receive government grant funding, the Conservation Consortium completes the conservation project.
When the Conservation Consortium launches an expedition to the rainforest region, then the Research Team collects samples of rare plant species.
Under the condition that the Research Team collects samples of rare plant species, then the Research Team does not halt its operations.
If the Research Team discovers a cure for a rare disease, then the Research Team publishes its findings in a scientific journal.
Either the Research Team discovers a cure for a rare disease or the Conservation Consortium completes the conservation project.

Should it not be the case that if the Research Team discovers a cure for a rare disease then the Research Team does not publish its findings in a scientific journal, then the Research Team receives an environmental prize award.

Should it not be the case that if the Research Team discovers a cure for a rare disease then the Research Team does not publish its findings in a scientific journal, then the Research Team does not receive an environmental prize award.
If the Scientific Review Board does not approve the conservation project proposal, then the Research Team halts its operations.
If the Scientific Review Board does not approve the conservation project proposal, then the Conservation Consortium launches an expedition to the rainforest region.

facts.natural: The Conservation Consortium receives government grant funding.

target.natural: The Conservation Consortium completes the conservation project.

(A1 → G).natural: If the Conservation Consortium receives government grant funding, then the Conservation Consortium completes the conservation project.

(A2 → (A1 → G)).natural: If the Scientific Review Board approves the conservation project proposal, then should the Conservation Consortium receive government grant funding, the Conservation Consortium completes the conservation project.

(A4 → A5).natural: When the Conservation Consortium launches an expedition to the rainforest region, then the Research Team collects samples of rare plant species.

(A4 → ¬A3).natural: Provided that the Conservation Consortium launches an expedition to the rainforest region, then the Research Team does not halt its operations.

(A5 → ¬A3).natural: Under the condition that the Research Team collects samples of rare plant species, then the Research Team does not halt its operations.

(A6 → A7).natural: If the Research Team discovers a cure for a rare disease, then the Research Team publishes its findings in a scientific journal.

(A6 → ¬A7).natural: If the Research Team discovers a cure for a rare disease, then the Research Team does not publish its findings in a scientific journal.

(A6 ∨ G).natural: Either the Research Team discovers a cure for a rare disease or the Conservation Consortium completes the conservation project.

(¬(A6 → ¬A7) → A8).natural: Should it not be the case that if the Research Team discovers a cure for a rare disease then the Research Team does not publish its findings in a scientific journal, then the Research Team receives an environmental prize award.

(¬(A6 → ¬A7) → ¬A8).natural: Should it not be the case that if the Research Team discovers a cure for a rare disease then the Research Team does not publish its findings in a scientific journal, then the Research Team does not receive an environmental prize award.

(¬A2 → A3).natural: If the Scientific Review Board does not approve the conservation project proposal, then the Research Team halts its operations.
